summary: Donald Trump, during a debate in Singapore on June 12th, 2018, claimed that it is too early to establish diplomatic relations and exchange ambassadors, but he hopes it will happen soon once things start moving.

Donald Trump, during a debate in Singapore on June 12th, 2018, claimed that the United States would stop military exercises with South Korea. He stated that they have been doing exercises for a long time and it is now time to stop them.

Donald Trump, during a debate in Singapore on June 12th, 2018, claimed that the United States has been conducting military exercises with South Korea for a long time. He stated that it is a little bit early to stop these exercises, but they need to get things moving first.
